a.JXBID = #{JXBID}

and a.XNXQDM=#{academicYear} and (a.KCH='121066' OR a.KCH='121067' OR a.KCH='122036')

and a.JXBID like "%"#{courseId}"%"
and a.JXBMC like "%"#{classNum}"%"
